Title: Provides for the automatic enrollment of employees of the city of New York eligible to join the New York city board of education retirement system
Summary: Provides for the automatic enrollment of employees of the city of New York eligible to join the New York city board of education retirement system.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing for the automatic enrollment of employees of the city of New York eligible to join the New York city board of education retirement system
